column5: I just hate that! My whole family is depressed and I am not even allowed to be sad? It sucks lol
It could also be separation anxiety
Good point
.....Celery. The cat reminds me of celery............lol

I was at a kind of opposite to this. My mom and I were homeless on an island off the coast of Washington and my siblings all left. Mom felt really depressed and even went off to end it one night. I didn't know where she went or when she would be coming back and I already knew how she felt and basically worried for her until she returned. I remember a few days later she told me about what she almost did and why. I beg of you, if you can't stand life married to your wife, please just divorce and fight for custody or something. Just don't die please. Personally speaking, it hurts a lot to know that I almost lost one of the only people I care about. It might take a while to find something to make you happy but know that there will always be someone who loves you even if you don't think so.
Don't live/die for them. Live for yourself!
Heh lol
You're not a shitty person and the person that did that is a total peice of garbage not you.
Happy birthday! I'm proud of you! :)

I'm sorry that this has happened to you. The world is terrible. I don't understand what you're going through nearly as much but I do know that it hurts. If you want anyone to talk to, even if it's about nothing, feel free to message me. I only get on at night but I'll try to respond whenever I can.

Tell your mom and some cops. I know that it will be hard and I have lived homeless for a while so I do understand not having an income but if you don't do anything it's going to get worse. I'm really sorry that you are going through this. If you ever want to talk, feel free to message me. I'm only on at night but I will always try to respond.
Sorry for the late reply. We did get that whole mess finished lol
